text: 1.2 Apo 9.14, 18.1, 18.17, Lom 1.7, 10.12, 1 Ko 6.11, 2 Ti 1.9 chɨl mɨj anɨb ak ñu kɨl tɨkobul. Tɨkɨl, nɨbi God binɨb ne taun Kolin pelpel apnan gɨpɨm ak nɨbop ñobun. God ne ke nɨbop binɨb suŋtep yad yelaŋ agɨl dɨnɨg nɨm, Klays Jisas nop agyokek apɨl gek, binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdebɨm. Nɨbop ayɨp, binɨb man okok mɨdupsek kɨli Bɨawl chɨn Jisas Klays nop agnɨŋɨd yɨb nop dad aplanebal okok ayɨp, nɨbop binɨb yad aglak. Jisas Klays, ne Bɨawl kɨli ak mɨdɨl, Bɨawl chɨn ak abe mɨdeb.
